amendment.description: Amendment authorizes support for public-private partnerships and industry programs that seek to overcome barriers to commercial production.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-255 to authorize support for public-private partnerships and industry programs that seek to overcome barriers to commercial production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massa amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 14 (Roll no. 707).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Massa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massa amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 14 (Roll no. 707).
